content.text:
# ITA Award for Best Actress Drama Jury

ITA Award for Best Actress Drama Jury, also known as Best Actress Jury, is an award given by the Indian Television Academy jury as a part of its annual event.
Superlatives
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center"
|- style="height:4.5em;"
| Actress with most awards
| Shweta Tiwari
| style="width:100px;"| 5
|- style="height:4.5em;"

| style="width:500px;"|Sakshi Tanwar
| style="width:100px;"| 6
|- style="height:4.5em;"
|Actress with most nominations(without ever winning)
| style="width:500px;"|Shivangi Joshi and Rupali Ganguly
| style="width:100px;"|5
|- style="height:4.5em;"
|Character with most wins
| style="width:500px;"|Prerna Sharma
| style="width:100px;"|3
|- style="height:4.5em;"
|}
